name: Both Sides of the Way
description:
This game is a 2022 Epic MegaJam submission

The game is created during one weak from scratch.

Used graphics and animation assets:

  • Infinity Blade: Fire Lands (Unreal Enginen Marketplace)

  • Stylized Nature Pack (Unreal Enginen Marketplace)

  • Some animations for my model from Mixamo.com
